metadata.title: CVE-2019-17533 on Ubuntu 18.04 LTS (bionic) - medium
metadata.description:
Mat_VarReadNextInfo4 in mat4.c in MATIO 1.5.17 omits a certain '\0'character, leading to a heap-based buffer over-read in strdup_vprintf whenuninitialized memory is accessed.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2019-17533` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

libmatio4 - 1.5.11-1ubuntu0.1~esm1
Available with Ubuntu Pro: https://ubuntu.com/pro

criterions.comment: libmatio package in bionic was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '1.5.11-1ubuntu0.1~esm1').
libpdl-io-matlab-perl package in bionic is affected and may need fixing.
